name: Kids Detangling Shampoo
about: What it is:A nourishing shampoo that gently cleanses and detangles all hair types..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Results in soft, shiny hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Plant Protein Peptides: Strengthen, moisturize, and visibly boost luminosity..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free..What Else You Need to Know:Your childu2019s shampoo just got an upgrade. Carefully formulated with plant peptides, argan oil, and shea butter, this nourishing shampoo results in soft, shiny, hair that is easy to comb and style. Can be used as a two-in-one shampoo and conditioner or a hydrating conditioner depending on hair type..Clinical Results:
ingredients: -Plant Protein Peptides: Strengthen, moisturize, and visibly boost luminosity..-Shea Butter: Full of fatty acids and vitamins to hydrate and protect hair..-Argan Oil: Rich in antioxidants to lock in moisture, add shine, and fight frizz...Water (Aqua), Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Methyl Lauroyl Taurate, Glycerin, Propanediol, Decyl Glucoside, Glycol Distearate, Sodium.Cocoyl Alaninate, Isostearamidopropyl Morpholine Lactate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Apricot Kernel Oil.Polyglyceryl-6 Esters, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Arginine, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Citric Acid...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Pump into hand and gently massage into wet hair. Rinse well. .-Follow with Kids Detangling Conditioner (sold separately). .-Use daily or as needed throughout the week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo has a very cute package, and my kid loved that! It scents really good, and my kidu2019s hair was very shiny after its use. I certainly recommend this product because it is a good value for the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my daughteru2019s hair so soft and shiny. The scent was not overpowering but just the right amount. Packaging is on point, very convenient to use and that cute little wink on the bottle is super cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This childrenu2019s detangling shampoo is such a wonderful addition to our bath time routine. First off, the packaging is so adorable and fun! Secondly, the aroma is sweet and with gentle fruity notes! It lathers easily and immediately makes hair feel softer and cleaner! A mom win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for an honest review. First things first, I adore the packaging. When you twist it to open it, it lines up as a cute winking smile. At first I thought 200ml was a small sized bottle, for the price of the product, but overall, it is a really moisturizing shampoo and it lathers super nice so you only need the tiniest pea sized amount . The pump makes it easy to disperse the tiniest amount. A bonus too, besides the amazing smell and moisturizing lather, is that it is free of all the junk we donu2019t want in ours or our kids products. (No parabens, no phthalates, no sulfates or silicones ) . Just loaded up with plant extracts, Argan oils and Shea butters. This is one is a must have and I only wish I had the conditioner to pair it with (although the shampoo IS hydrating enough for little kids hair , as long as they arenu2019t TOO dry of a hair type). I have color treated hair and I used it too and it was quite nice on my hair as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this free product for my son and I love it!! It smells so good! I will definitely buy again for my son.

If youu2019re looking for a high-quality, kid-friendly shampoo that delivers great results, Ever Edenu2019s Detangling Shampoo is an excellent investment.

reviews.review_title: Ever Eden Kids Detangling Shampoo: A Game-Changer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample and here is my review: Finding the right shampoo for my childu2019s extra curly, long hair has always been a challengeu2014until we discovered Ever Eden Kids Detangling Shampoo. Here's why we love it:  1. Gentle Yet Effective: The shampoo has a mild, tear-free formula that cleanses the hair thoroughly without stripping away moisture. It leaves my childu2019s curls feeling soft and hydrated after every wash.   2. Detangling Magic: This shampoo truly lives up to its name. Detangling long, curly hair used to be a dreaded chore, but now the comb glides through effortlessly after washing. It's been a huge time saver during our hair care routine.   3. Natural Ingredients: Ever Edenu2019s focus on clean, plant-based ingredients gives me peace of mind. It's free of harsh chemicals and enriched with nourishing elements that promote healthy hair.   4. Pleasant Scent: The light, fresh scent is not overpowering but adds a nice touch that my child enjoys.   5. Curly-Hair Friendly: The shampoo enhances the natural curl pattern, leaving the hair looking defined, shiny, and bouncy. It works beautifully without the need for additional heavy styling products.    Overall, Ever Eden Kids Detangling Shampoo has been a game-changer for our family. It simplifies our hair care routine while keeping my childu2019s long, curly hair looking and feeling amazing. Highly recommended for anyone with little ones with curly or textured hair!

reviews.review_text: I was eyeing this shampoo on Sephora for several months, and I was beyond happy when I got a chance to try it! The packaging is super cute, a love at first sight! It has a nice herbal scent, pretty unusual for kids' products which almost always have added artificial sweet fragrances. My son has longer hair, up to his shoulders. When he used previous drugstore shampoos, his hair would look not clean and limp after a day at school. When he uses this shampoo, his hair looks good after a full day of activities! It feels clean and healthy. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Adorably fun packaging and incredible scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the absolute CUTEST packaging! The smiley face is so adorable and fun.   The pump feature is great. Itu2019s leakproof and If it falls into the bath, water canu2019t get inside the packaging. The pump dispenses the perfect amount. A little bit goes A LONG way!   This is also the most incredibly scent. Itu2019s very light, but so lovely. Itu2019s also long lasting. I couldnu2019t stop smelling my kidu2019s hair.   It was very gentle yet still hydrating. Both my kidu2019s hair was super soft afterwards.   No red itchy eyes and no tears while rinsing.   Itu2019s not cheap, so Iu2019d say this is more on the luxury side of the kidu2019s products spectrum. $39.50 CDN (plus tax) for 200mL is a bit crazy in my books, but I can see this lasting a very long time since the pump dispenses the right amount. This is the only reason why I rated 4 stars.  If this is within your budget, I highly recommend giving it a try. Itu2019s lovely and both of my kids have been really enjoying adding this to our nightly routine. Iu2019m definitely going to explore this brand and their other kidu2019s products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shampoo is made with plant based protein and is dermatologist tested. It has no sulphate, no silicone. The bottle will take your heart away. The shampoo has a very light pleasant fragrance. Now digging into the result. My daughter has thick hair which tangles a lot. Used the shampoo and it was a relief that it did help with the detangling and worked wonderfully. However, the shampoo is not good moisturizing. Her hairs were puffed and dry after the wash. Wish it had more moisturizing ingredients.

reviews.review_title: A must have for your child!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: Evereden Kids Detangling Shampoo is a game-changer.  From its gentle formula to its amazing detangling power, this shampoo makes bath time a breeze. It leaves my child's hair feeling soft, smooth, and knot-free every time. Plus, knowing it's made with safe, natural ingredients gives me peace of mind. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently discovered the perfect solution for managing my kids' different hair types with one fantastic product: the Evereden Kids Detangling Shampoo. From its adorably cute packaging that instantly captures their attention to its effective formula, this shampoo has become a staple in our household.  Firstly, let's talk about the scent u2013 it's delightful! The gentle fragrance leaves hair smelling fresh and clean without being overpowering, which is perfect for kids.   But what truly sets this shampoo apart is its performance. Not only does it cleanse hair effectively, but it also tackles those pesky tangles with ease. Thanks to the plant protein peptides, it strengthens and moisturizes their hair, leaving it visibly luminous u2013 a bonus for both kids and parents alike.  The inclusion of shea butter and argan oil adds another layer of nourishment, hydrating and protecting their delicate strands. With these ingredients, frizz is kept at bay, and hair shines with health.  I appreciate how this shampoo is suitable for all hair types, making it convenient for my kids who have different textures. Plus, a little goes a long way, thanks to its impressive lathering ability, making it both economical and practical.  In conclusion, the Kids Detangling Shampoo is a game-changer for parents seeking a hassle-free hair care solution for their little ones. With its effective formula, delightful scent, and charming packaging, it's a win-win for the whole family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is absolutely incredible. The bottle is the cutest thing Iu2019ve ever seen. My daughter loves everything about it: the wink design, the coloru2019s bottle, the smell, the foam. You should try it with your kids too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is a great choice for parents looking for a gentle, yet effective cleanser for their child's hair. Packed with plant protein peptides, shea butter, and argan oil, this shampoo cleanses without stripping hair of moisture. Makes detangling beyond easy, a huge plus for kids with tangles!  This nourishing shampoo is a gentle and effective option for keeping your child's hair clean, soft, and manageable. With its focus on natural ingredients and versatility for different hair types.

reviews.review_title: This shampoo is definitely the best for my son
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I been using this shampoo for a couple weeks with my son and he really is enjoying it. Must I say it even smells so lovely. Also it does have the cutest packaging which my son likes to look at  .  It leaves his hair feeling so nice and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tangling shampoo worked really well for my daughter who has straight tangly ends.  When I first lathered it onto her hair, I can smell the florally scent of the shampoo. It's very light and subtle which is fine to me since it wasn't heavily fragrance. You don't need to use a lot of shampoo to lather up the hair, as a little goes a long way because it suds up a lot. As I was working up a lather for my daughter's hair, I can feel the hair soften and untangling as I was washing it. I don't think I can use this often as it's not a big bottle and it's quite expensive to use daily. Overall, it's nice to have but not necessary to purchase as it is expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought I would be jealous of my childu2019s shampoo! The bottle itself is so cute. I love the pump, my son can use it himself without worrying about waste. It smells SO GOOD. Lathers up beautifully and leaves his hair squeaky clean! Zero tangles afterwards when we are combing his hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing I loved about this shampoo is the packaging! Itu2019s so fun, bright and kid friendly. The pump made it super easy to use vs. having to turn upside down with a crazy child in the tub and shut before it spills everywhere. Next, I loved the scent. It made my daughteru2019s hair easy to brush, and smooth when dry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the smell and packing of this item, itu2019s a super cute, friendly looking bottle. The shampoo itself cleans very well but almost u2018toou2019 well considering itu2019s meant to detangle. I didnu2019t find it helpful at all in terms of detangling - if anything I think it made it even more difficult to comb through the hair as it was SO squeaky clean. Iu2019ll keep using it on my child as a regular good shampoo but wonu2019t expect it to do magic with knots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is our new favourite! Not only does it smell amazing, but my three daughtersu2019 hair is silky smooth afterwards. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product on the first day, I noticed how easy it was to comb my 2 year Olds hair...knot free.. the smell is amazing .. leaves the hair shiny and silky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! From the first pump the lovely scent right away shows this is a quality product. I used the shampoo on myself as my 8 yr old said she didnu2019t want me helping her wash her hair and I could use it myself to review! Only 1 pump is enough to wash my hair and it lathers beautifully. The whole time I was enjoying the scent and thinking this should be my shampoo not for kids lol. I could feel that my hair felt clean and it didnu2019t need a long rinse to feel the product was washed off. I then blow dried my hair and again I was in love with the scent! It is not over powering, doesnu2019t smell fake and just makes you feel like you are at a salon. My hair was easy to comb without using a conditioner and my hair looked clean and even more full. So this shampoo really left me in awe but the price was also OMG! I will continue to use it and buy the end of using the bottle will decide if it is worth the high price. I received this product for free to test and provide my review. If I saw this on the shelf I would never buy it due to the price but now that I was able to try it for free I may be splurging and buying this as a regular shampoo. I mean even the bottle winks at me so who can resist!
